channel.title: Shops are broken dont now how to fix
channel.description:
kk so i was editing and i added some stuff like a shop but the bullshit didnt work so i tryd some stuff and now all my fucking shops are fuckd up and when i trade them i disconnect and it gives me this error [code]java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -44 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:15894) at client.packetProcess(client.java:15006) at client.process(client.java:14976) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:47) Cheezscape Server [fatal] - exception[/code]
help me plz srry for swearing im frustrated cous i dont wanna start over again...
